name: How do I use a gun?
desc: You got a small Pistol from Henry but he didn't mention on how to equip it. Go and ask him!
short: Ask Henry on how to equip a gun

dialog.answer: Y-you first have t-to equip a weapon. Y-you can do so by opening your i-inventory with <ACTION_inventory>, c-click on your weapon of choice and select 'Equip'. In missions you also have to put munition for your guns in your run inventory. Here on the ship we have enough, thats pretty nice to just try out new guns. Lets start with the pistol i gave you.
